channel.title: Blog on Brodie Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Brodie Blog

item.title: Blog 2019
item.description: Here We Go Again Just like last year, I’ve been getting that urge to start keep a blog again. This year, I’ve managed to clean up a few things with the process! I’ve switched to using Hugo to generate a static site. It’s a lot more full featured than my hacked together generator in C. Switching to Hugo means that I’ll have pagination without having to write it myself. It also means that I can switch to using markdown to write posts!
